dashboard.trial-ended: Your trial has ended. Upgrade now or risk losing all synchronised events.

valid.delete-info: This will delete the rule, and also remove all the events that were synchronized by this rule in your Google calendars.

sync.customize-event-template: Customize the title and description of synced events
